frontmatter.title: An Implementation of H.264 Video Codec

node.html: A H.264 Accelerator implemented using Verilog. Used SystemC to design a HW/SW co-simulation environment to simulate PCIe(transport layer). Competes with state of the art accelerators.
Created a Traffic control Reinforcement learning agent with Q-learning and PPO. Used city of london traffic data and street map data in SUMO and CityFlow to simulate real-world usage.

frontmatter.title: Koch Fractal Based Wearable Antenna Backed with EBG Plane

node.html: A low-profile Koch modified monopole antenna backed with EBG plane has been designed in this work for wearable applications of MBAN band (3.5 GHz) standards. The designed EBG-antenna is composed of a triangular-shaped microstrip antenna as a radiator and a 2 x 2 square-shaped EBG plane as a reflector.
